title: Bullbirdie

comments.author: disconnectme
comments.body: This is the same set Meme tokens flooding the market space, why another Meme token since we already have thousands of them on the market now and the same community driven marketing gimmick and you even mentioned it is a completely useless tokens why do you want gullible and greedy investors to lose money to this and get trapped for life. I am tired of people just creating tokens out of thin air because it is given everyone a bad name, reason being that people like you don't make the serious developers to be taken seriously because they get lost in the crowd
